_comment: AD8338 - Low Power Variable Gain Amplifier (VGA) with 0 dB to 80 dB gain range
description: AD8338 Low Power Variable Gain Amplifier, 0 dB to 80 dB gain range, up to 18 MHz bandwidth
_comment_G: Typical/nominal gain, dB (mid-range, 40 dB typical operating point)
_comment_delta_G: Gain step resolution, dB (typical 0.1 dB resolution via control voltage)
_comment_BW_VGA: Bandwidth, Hz (18 MHz typical, frequency response depends on gain setting)
_comment_T_set: Settling time, seconds (typical 1 µs for gain changes)
_comment_V_supply_min: Minimum supply voltage, V (single supply operation)
_comment_I_supply_40dB: Supply current at 40 dB gain, A (3 mA typical)
_comment_input_noise_80dB: Input voltage noise at 80 dB gain, V/√Hz (4.5 nV/√Hz)
_comment_input_noise_0dB: Input voltage noise at 0 dB gain, V/√Hz (8 nV/√Hz typical)
